publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-344# Phil Gallie: Congratulations to Swedenâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the Swedish nation for standing up to the pressure of politicians at home and abroad whose aim, as stated by the Italian Ambassador to the United Kingdom, is to give birth to a European super state and considers that the Scottish Executive should apply pressure on Her Majesty's Government to hold referenda on both the European constitution and the common European currency at an early date in order that uncertainties within the Scottish economy are removed in line with the democratic wishes of Scots and UK citizens as a whole. Supported by: Mark Ballard*, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton*
S2M-344# Congratulations to Sweden (lodged on 15 September 2003) Mary Scanlon*, Mr Ted Brocklebank*
S2M-344# Congratulations to Sweden (lodged on 15 September 2003) Murdo Fraser*, Dr Jean Turner*

S2M-344# Phil Gallie: Congratulations to Sweden-That the Parliament congratulates the Swedish nation for standing up to the pressure of politicians at home and abroad whose aim, as stated by the Italian Ambassador to the United Kingdom, is to give birth to a European super state and considers that the Scottish Executive should apply pressure on Her Majesty's Government to hold referenda on both the European constitution and the common European currency at an early date in order that uncertainties within the Scottish economy are removed in line with the democratic wishes of Scots and UK citizens as a whole. Supported by: Mark Ballard, Lord James Douglas-Hamilton, Mary Scanlon, Mr Ted Brocklebank, Murdo Fraser, Dr Jean Turner, Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-344# Congratulations to Sweden (lodged on 15 September 2003) Mrs Nanette Milne*
S2M-344# Congratulations to Sweden (lodged on 15 September 2003) Mr David Davidson*
